alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 223 PM MDT/323 PM CDT/, conditions remain favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in and close to areas of southern Yuma county, the northwest half of Kit Carson county, northwest Sherman county and much of Cheyenne county Kansas. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm would produce a landspout. Any landspouts which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. Locations impacted include... St. Francis, Stratton, Seibert, Bonny Reservoir, Bird City, Bethune and Vona. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
